title: [FEA] better rapids shuffle configuration
body:
I hope we could have a better rapids shuffle configuration support.
In spark standalone mode, if I want to use spark-rapids shuffle manager, I need to set as below according to [rapids-shuffle](https://nvidia.github.io/spark-rapids/docs/additional-functionality/rapids-shuffle.html) doc:
```
--conf spark.shuffle.manager=com.nvidia.spark.rapids.[shim package].RapidsShuffleManager \
--conf spark.driver.extraClassPath=${SPARK_RAPIDS_PLUGIN_JAR} \
--conf spark.executor.extraClassPath=${SPARK_RAPIDS_PLUGIN_JAR}
```
however, according to [config](https://nvidia.github.io/spark-rapids/docs/configs.html) doc, we could enable/disable it by setting
`spark.rapids.shuffle.enabled`, it is true by default, but actually even if I set `spark.rapids.shuffle.enabled=false`, if I already set
```
--conf spark.shuffle.manager=com.nvidia.spark.rapids.[shim package].RapidsShuffleManager \
--conf spark.driver.extraClassPath=${SPARK_RAPIDS_PLUGIN_JAR} \
--conf spark.executor.extraClassPath=${SPARK_RAPIDS_PLUGIN_JAR}
```
the spark-rapids shuffle manager still works, I confirm this by finding `rs. shuffle read time total (min, med, max (stageId: taskId))` in **GpuColumnarExchange** metrics, this is confused, this behavior does not match `When set to false, the built-in Spark shuffle will be used.`

And it is better if we could automatically setting `--conf spark.shuffle.managerXXX ` stuffs
